text: A totally dishonest hawker group, I informed the hawker staff about my prawn allergy and specifically requested no prawns in my dish. While waiting, I observed them removing prawns from a prepared meal, intending to serve it to me. Only when they noticed me watching did they realize the need to prepare a fresh, prawn-free dish.
Had fish head with bitter gourd. Excellent quality for only $26. Fresh and tasty!
